info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 22 at 4:24AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Refugio County through 500 AM CDT... At 424 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Woodsboro, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Refugio, Woodsboro and Quintana. This includes the following highways... US Highway 183 between mile markers 662 and 668. US Highway 77 between mile markers 606 and 626. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
